message.content:
I need to identify and extract the value of cash payments to acquire property, plant and equipment and other long-term assets from the cash flow statement.

Looking at the statement, I see a section for "Cash Flow from Investing Activities" which contains the line item "Purchase of Fixed Assets". This is exactly what I'm looking for - cash payments to acquire property, plant and equipment.

The value for "Purchase of Fixed Assets" is shown as 0.00, indicating there were no cash payments to acquire property, plant and equipment during this period.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '0.00'} }
```
